unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather *really* messes with our yields! Last year, 20/07/2023, the monsoons were so late in Maharashtra. My uncle Ramlal's farm near Pune suffered a lot. Even with the best seeds from IARI, if barish doesn't cooperate...toh kya faida? Hoping for better luck this kharif season, maybe after 15/08/2024, during Independence Day celebrations. Heard some new irrigation schemes are coming up, maybe by 10:00 hrs on 01/01/2025. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Arre yaar, weather really messes with our yields! Last year, twentieth july two thousand and twenty three, the monsoons were so late in Maharashtra. My uncle Ramlal's farm near Pune suffered a lot. Even with the best seeds from I A R I, if barish doesn't cooperate...toh kya faida? Hoping for better luck this kharif season, maybe after fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four, during Independence Day celebrations. Heard some new irrigation schemes are coming up, maybe by ten zero zero hours on first january two thousand and twenty five. Jai Kisan!
